title: Things You Thought You Knew – The Fast and The Friction
description:
What is the Magnus Effect? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and co-hosts Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly explore physics through spin, banking, and angular momentum. Why are race tracks banked? 

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://startalkmedia.com/show/things-you-thought-you-knew-the-fast-and-the-friction/

Photo Credit: Brandon Zeman, CC BY-SA 2.0, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Chuck Nice, Gary O'Reilly)
